.class public auto ansi sealed TextDecoration extends System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable

summary.span: 表示一个文本修饰，它是可添加到文本的视觉装饰（如下划线）。

span.span: Represents a text decoration, which a visual ornamentation that is added to text (such as an underline).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有四种类型的文本修饰：下划线、基线、删除线和上划线。There are four types of text decorations: underline, baseline, strikethrough, and overline. 下面的示例演示文本修饰相对于文本的位置。The following example shows the locations of the text decorations relative to the text. ![文本修饰位置示意图](~/add/media/textdecoration01.gif "文本修饰位置示意图")![Diagram of text decoration locations](~/add/media/textdecoration01.gif "Diagram of text decoration locations") 文本修饰类型示例Example of text decoration types 下面的示例演示了使用线性渐变画笔和虚线笔进行样式化的文本修饰。The following example shows a text decoration that has been styled with a linear gradient brush and a dashed pen. ![采用线性渐变下划线的文本修饰](~/add/media/textdecoration02.png "采用线性渐变下划线的文本修饰")![Text decoration with linear gradient underline](~/add/media/textdecoration02.png "Text decoration with linear gradient underline") 使用线性渐变画笔和虚线笔样式的下划线的示例Example of an underline styled with a linear gradient brush and dashed pen 请注意， 派生自 。Notice that is derived from . 这样，便可以将动画效果应用于修饰元素，并为使用 和 。This makes it possible to apply animated effects to the decoration elements, using a for the and a for the .

span.span: The location of the text decoration.

param.span: 如果该值为 ，则文本修饰的颜色与它所应用于的文本的颜色相匹配，并且文本修饰的粗细将设置为字体的推荐粗细。

span.span: If this value is , the text decoration color matches the text color to which it is applied, and the text decoration's thickness is set to the font's recommended thickness.

param.name: penOffset
param.span: 相对于文本修饰位置的垂直位移。

span.span: The vertical displacement from the text decoration's location.

param.span: 如果为负值，则向下移动修饰；如果为正值，则向上移动修饰。

span.span: A negative value moves the decoration lower, while a positive value moves the decoration higher.

param.span: 用于解释 值的单位。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法用于生成冻结 对象 (或任何对象) 的可修改副本 。This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen objects (or any object). 为方便起见，此方法使用强类型实现隐藏了继承的版本。For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see . 在复制依赖项属性时，此方法会复制资源引用和数据绑定（但可能不再解析），但不复制动画或其当前值。When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法用于生成冻结 对象 (或任何对象) 的可修改副本 。This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen objects (or any object). 为方便起见，此方法使用强类型实现隐藏了继承的版本。For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see . 不复制资源引用、数据绑定和动画，而是复制其当前值。Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.

summary.span: 获取或设置文本修饰相对于其 的偏移量。

The default is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 负值会使文本修饰更高，而正值会使文本修饰减小。A negative value moves the text decoration higher, while a positive value moves the text decoration lower. 使用 属性指定如何解释此值的单位。Use the property to specify how the units of this value are interpreted. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置 属性。The following code example shows how to set the property.
